title: KGX Content Metadata
description: Description of a node category for Knowledge Graph eXchange (KGX) knowledge graph content metadata

nodes.description: Collection of node categories provided by this TRAPI web service, indexed by Biolink class CURIEs.

edges.description: List of edges/predicates provided by this knowledge graph.

id_prefixes.description: List of CURIE prefixes for the node category that this Knowledge Graph contains.

count.description: Total number of node instances of this node category known to this knowledge graph, or -1 if the number is not known.

count_by_source.description: Number of node instances by knowledge source URI or CURIE or plain namespace identifier

MetaEdge.description: Edge in a meta knowledge map describing relationship between a subject Biolink class and an object Biolink class.

subject.description: Subject node category of this relationship edge.

predicate.description: Biolink relationship between the subject and object categories.

object.description: Object node category of this relationship edge.

relations.description: Low-level relations from the underlying source.

count.description: Total number of edge instances of this (subject, predicate, object) triple known to this knowledge graph, or -1 if the number is not known.

count_by_source.description: Number of edge instances by knowledge source URI or CURIE or plain namespace identifier

BiolinkEntity.description: Compact URI (CURIE) for a Biolink class, biolink:NamedThing or a child thereof. The CURIE must use the prefix 'biolink:' followed by the PascalCase class name.

BiolinkPredicate.description: CURIE for a Biolink 'predicate' slot, taken from the Biolink slot ('is_a') hierarchy rooted in biolink:related_to (snake_case). This predicate defines the Biolink relationship between the subject and object nodes of a biolink:Association defining a knowledge graph edge.
